text: Kenton County is a county in Kentucky. Its county seats are Covington and Independence. Kenton County is included in the Cincinnati-Middletown, OH-KY-IN Metropolitan Statistical Area. ==Communities== ===Cities=== *Bromley *Covington (county seat) *Crescent Springs *Crestview Hills *Edgewood *Elsmere *Erlanger *Fairview *Fort Mitchell *Fort Wright *Independence (county seat) *Kenton Vale *Lakeside Park *Ludlow *Park Hills *Ryland Heights *Taylor Mill *Villa Hills *Walton ===Unincorporated communities=== *Atwood *Latonia *Latonia Lakes *Nicholson *Visalia ==References== Category:1840s establishments in Kentucky Category:1840 establishments in the United States
title: Kenton County, Kentucky
